mdRecord.dcterms:title: Second Year Class, 1926-1927
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SOM, Class of 1929 Students unidentifed. Student roster in alphabetical order, not as appears in photos. Walter J. Allegree, Thomas L. Allman, Dewey L. Anderson, James P. Baker Jr., Wilbur A. Barker, John W. Bolen, Thomas Bradley, Francis L. Byers, Aubrey R. Carter, Hower R. Coleman Jr., Carl C. Cooley, Frank D. Costenbader, John M. C. Covington, Belle B. Dale, Alva D. Daughton, John R. Eggleston, Muarice M. Fliess, Hagop Gasparian, Arthur E. Glover, John M. Green, John H. Greene, Charles S. Groseclose, Eugene S. Groseclose, Donald O. Hamblin, Tarring W. Heironimus Jr., Guy W. Horsley, William C. Hutcheson, Troy H. Hutchinson, Jed J. Irvine, Eric F. Joslin, Charles Kavovit, Thomas C. Lawford, Maurice L. LeBauer, Sidney F. LeBauer, Meyer H. Legum, Archibald A. Little, Henry W. Litvack, Robert B. Lobban, Jules R. London, James L. Long, Robert W.C. McClanahan, Paul R. McFadyen, Alexander T. Mayo, Jose Menedez, Alberto Navaroo, Paul Otto, Minor B. Payne, Robert T. Peirce Jr., Robert E. Peyton, Frederick Pilcher Jr., John A. Pilcher Jr., Charles L. Savage, Lillie S. Shenk, Joseph M. Sloan, William C. Stephenson Jr., Christopher M. Turman Jr., Oliver L. Von Canon, John D. D. Ware, Hyman B. Weinberg, Harrison R. Wesson, Julius E. West, Isaac H. White, William L. Williams, Herbert D. Wolff, Jr., Bascom B. Young,
